properties.description: Horizontal text align, default is to the start of layout.
properties.name: align

properties.description: Vertical text align, default is to the start of layout.
properties.name: valign

properties.description: Whether to wrap lines, default is `true`.
properties.detail: Lines are wrapped at word boundaries.
properties.name: wrap

properties.description:
Whether to show ellipsis (...) at the end of the last visible line if the
text doesn't fit into the bounds specified, default is `false`.
properties.detail:
The text is broken at the boundary of the last character.

On Linux, `ellipsis` does not have effect if `wrap` is `false`.
properties.name: ellipsis
